title: Avanti to integrate Telesat Lightspeed LEO broadband services
summary: British satellite broadband operator Avanti Communications announced plans Feb. 22 to integrate the low Earth orbit services Canada’s Telesat aims to bring online in 2027 with its regional geostationary network.

title: NGA goes big on commercial satellite data with $290 million ‘Luno’ program
summary: The National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency seeks to leverage commercial satellite imagery and data analytics to enhance its global monitoring capabilities
